channel.title: Adding a decent and normal wall
channel.description:
Hello peeps
I've tried for hours to make a house , but it wont work. if i place objects , all walls have like a bookcase or something on it. i need a normal wall , a normal door and a normal roof. thats pretty easy in my eyes , so i would like it if anyone could tell me. It doesnt matter what kind of wall you got , but it has to fit for a house.
A stone wall or a Wood wall.
Stone as in
------------------------------ | | | | | | ------------------------------ | | | | | |
and Wooden as in
------------------------------ | | | | | | | | ------------------------------
think this is explained well enough ty
